Gerald Craig
Gerald Craig was Doctor Will Hayward's roommate at Washington University.
Biography
Craig drowned on a rafting trip on Snake River, where Hayward was present and tried to save him. 
 
Years later, Windom Earle impersonated Gerald Craig "on his way to a convention to Spokane" to get close to Hayward's daughter, Donna. He left "a gift" for Doc, which was actually his move in a chess game with Dale Cooper, and a phone number to a cemetery.
